caption: Query Information
description: The query info object contains data relating to accessing data within a datastore. If you need to access, manipulate, delete, or retrieve data from a datastore, you'll need a database query written using a specific syntax.
name: query_info

query_time.description: The time when the query was run.

data.description: The data returned from the query execution.

name.description: The query name for a saved or scheduled query.

uid.description: The unique identifier of the query.
